review: It's nice to get off my laptop for prime. It's easy to navigate through the menu, but would have been nice to have initial directions for the little remote.Sometimes speaking symbols only can be challenging.

review: I really do like the option to watch the movies

review: Love it!  Had an issue at first with distance to the router, but moved the router two feet and now it is fine!  Love the simplicity of it, and until I get a smart TV, this does the job!  It is so much easier than moving the laptop from TV to TV to watch shows.
author: Beach Girl

review: I love the Fire TV Stick. It turned my TV into a smart TV. I can watch Netfix plus so much more. Started Binge watching Breaking Bad.Thank you Krissy for getting this for Dad. I think I am using it more that he is.  Tee hee.
author: Carol

review: Purchased this after reading that I can use this while traveling. Simple to use. Glad it came with the usb extender, makes the remote control work well. Definitely recommend, especially if you don't have a smart TV or if you are a traveler!
author: April Sanchez

review: Easy to install and "fire up". Sorry, couldn't resist.  Better than we expected.  Really an awesome way to watch TV.  Highly recommend.  Thank you
author: Ted Nuttle

review: This is my second Fire Stick. I would buy more if I had more TV's.
author: Kindle Customer

review: I just put the stick into the HDMI receptacle on the back of the TV and I was in.  No problem.  You need to check  behind your TV and make sure you have an HDMI port.  If you don't have an extra port, you can get a "one in and two out" cable that will bifurcate the single port for dual purposes. This cable is usually suggested by Amazon when you buy the Fire TV stick.
author: Spete
